title: How JavaScript Is Finally Improving the Module Experience
author: Mary Branscombe
description: Multiple long-term proposals collectively known as "module harmony" will complete the features lost when JavaScript move away from CommonJS.
cntitle: JavaScript 终于改善了模块体验
cndescription: 多个长期提案（统称为“模块和谐”）将完成 JavaScript 离开 CommonJS 时失去的功能。
